message:
I've been trying to use gdb's reverse debugging feature with no success, I am on amd64, when I start recording using 'target record', then step over a few times, gdb stops debugging with the following error message:

Process record does not support instruction 0xc5 at address 0x7ffff7dee6e7.

Program stopped.
_dl_runtime_resolve_avx () at ../sysdeps/x86_64/dl-trampoline.h:81

Searching online shows very few relevant results with no fixes.
Has anyone used gdb's reverse debugging successfully ?

data.message: Issue solved, I linked the executable statically and reverse debugging works now, thanks for reading :)
